The Cincinnati Reds procl_____ Saturday, September 17, 1983, `` Johnny Bench Night '' at Riverfront Stadium, in wh___ he h__ his 389th and fi___ home r__, a line dr___ to le__ in t__ third inn___ before a record cr___. data.fullContent: For the last three seasons of his career, Bench caught only 13 games and played mostly first base or third base. The Cincinnati Reds proclaimed Saturday, September 17, 1983, `` Johnny Bench Night '' at Riverfront Stadium, in which he hit his 389th and final home run, a line drive to left in the third inning before a record crowd. He retired at the end of the season at age 35.
data.answer: 在他职业生涯的最后三个赛季里，本奇只打了13场比赛，而且大部分时间都打一垒或三垒。1983年9月17日，辛辛那提红人队(Cincinnati Reds)在河边体育场(Riverfront Stadium)宣布了“约翰尼本奇之夜”(Johnny Bench Night)，在那里，他打出了自己的第389支也是最后一支本垒打，在第三局的比赛中，在创纪录的观众面前打出了一记左线直击。他在赛季结束时退役，时年35岁。
